CADI.Viewer.Display

Class DisplayPane.Displayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • CADI.Viewer.Display.DisplayPane.Displayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Enclosing class:
    DisplayPane

     class DisplayPane.Displayer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class implements the drawing area where image will be displayed. It only performs the drawing of the image on the panel and managing of the tool tip of the image pixels.

    Events are not captured because they are grouped in the DisplayPane class.
